casebody.data:
Farrengo, Appellant, v. Saracco, Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. May 16, 1889.)

Argued before Larremore, C. J„ and Allen and Bookstaver, JJ.

8. B. Seward, for appellant. A. C. Astarita, for respondent.

Judgment reversed, new trial ordered, costs to abide the event.
